description.base: An ancient IÃ±upiaq man with skin like cracked leather. He watches the horizon.

lens.believer: He speaks to the wind, and sometimes, it answers.
lens.skeptic: A traditionalist clinging to old ways in a changing world.
lens.haunted: He looks at you with pity, as if he knows your fate.

description.base: Sharp, focused, always checking her instruments. She doesn't have time for stories.

lens.believer: She refuses to look at the data that doesn't make sense.
lens.skeptic: A beacon of reason in this madness.
lens.haunted: Her denial is a wall she built to keep the fear out.

description.base: A frantic man covered in layers of mismatched clothes. He smells of old paper and coffee.

lens.believer: He knows. He's connected the dots you're just starting to see.
lens.haunted: He's seen the edges of the simulation.

description.base: Serene, smiling, with eyes that seem to glow faintly in the dark.

lens.believer: A prophet of the new age.
lens.skeptic: A charismatic leader exploiting vulnerable people.
lens.haunted: She is not entirely human anymore.
